page.title: 06Crown Chemicals and Abattoir
page.content: Two large employers in Lamberhurst are the{Crown Chemical Company}and the{Abattoir}. The Crown Chemical Company is a place where about 150 people are employed to make drugs for{animals. The company supplies farmers and veterinary surgeons. The two parts of the works are on both sides of the main road so there are some traffic hazards. Their products include bath salts for pigeons, acid_burn jelly and nurses' hand cream, which are also exported thoughout the world. Lamberhurst has one of the largest {slaughter houses}in the country which deals almost exclusively with{sheep.} The meat produced is sold both at home and abroad, with the remains being resold for animal food processing and clothing.
